column4: hey guys, anyone can tell me how can I mount an ISO file (extracted from an Audio CD) ? it doesn't work with mount -o loop
by 'extracted' you mean a 'image file' made from a cd?
you could try a 'vlc whateverthethingis.iso' and see if it plays it..
I did try it with VLC also.. couldn't play a thing.. anyways.. thx for the help guys ;)
